product_name: New Balance WT10v1 Minimus GTX Trail-Running Shoes - Women's
long_description: The women's New Balance WT10v1 Minimus GTX Trail-Running Shoes combine the durability of Vibram(R) rubber outsoles with the waterproof protection of GORE-TEX(R) for your comfort on the trails. GORE-TEX waterproof liners let feet breathe while protecting them from the elements, keeping them dry and comfortable. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. WT10v1 Minimus GTX Trail-Running Shoes feature EVA midsoles for superb flexibility and a featherweight cushion. Vibram rubber outsoles provide lightweight performance without compromising grip or stability; lugs on medial sides increase traction.
short_description: The women's New Balance WT10v1 Minimus GTX Trail-Running Shoes combine the durability of Vibram(R) rubber outsoles with the waterproof protection of GORE-TEX(R) for your comfort on the trails.
